name: CHUNKY BOI ESCAPES THE SPACE GULAG
name_original: CHUNKY BOI ESCAPES THE SPACE GULAG
description:
Chunky Boi was arrested for crimes against the state.  The SPACE state.   His punishment?  To be put in a suit that makes him totally immobile, for the rest of his natural born days.

Unfortunately, the space commies didn't realize that his suit had a quantum position reflector in it.   Unable to move, Chunky Boi must use his one and only means of interacting with the environment to escape the space gulag -- the teleporter, which lets him swap places with any object in space prison.

One way to interact with the environment.  One button.  One man. One gulag. Much chunk.

Coding:  Thierry Treyer, Austin Gunsauley
Design:  Austin Gunsauley, Thierry Treyer, Chris Maryatt
Art: Chris Maryatt
Sound: Chris Maryatt
